name: Circuit Breaker (itch) (Marshmallows7920, Chopstx2, Ara Santos, ahmedas, Lyle Arcinas, khathepham, kerchup)
name_original: Circuit Breaker (itch) (Marshmallows7920, Chopstx2, Ara Santos, ahmedas, Lyle Arcinas, khathepham, kerchup)
description:
This was a game made in a 48-hour jam at the university of Manitoba. Currently  only one player. In the future it can be expanded to be a multiplayer game where Bob and Boba are versing each other. One creating the glitches, one fixing them.

==========================================================

Rules of the Game  

You are a lonely cat named Boba (because of your spots). You have infiltrated your owner Bob's computer and your job is to create glitches to get them fired. This way they won’t have a job anymore and can spend more time with you! You win when the timer ends or created enough glitches that Bob is unable to keep up.

==========================================================
